exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "filterdiff f (locally x) l" on hypothesis of type "locally (f x) eps".

In environment K : AbsRing U, V : NormedModule K f : U -> V x : U l : U -> V Hl : filterdiff f (locally x) l eps : V -> Prop Heps : locally (f x) eps Unable to unify "locally (f x) eps" with "filtermap f (locally x) eps".

original: intros H. unfold continuous, filterlim in *. intros eps Heps. destruct H as [l Hl]. apply Hl in Heps. apply Heps.
